wynn-war-cooldown.config.title: Wynn War Cooldown Configuration
wynn-war-cooldown.config.hud_scale.toolt: Scale the timer size (0.1 = smaller, 5.0 = larger)
wynn-war-cooldown.config.offset.tooltip: Adjust when the timer ends relative to the cooldown. Positive = earlier, Negative = later
When to execute command relative to timer end. Positive = before, Negative = after
wynn-war-cooldown.config.sound_offset.to: When to play sound relative to timer end. Positive = before, Negative = after
wynn-war-cooldown.config.command.tooltip: Command/message sent when timer ends. Use /say for chat or /request for commands
wynn-war-cooldown.config.sound_type.tool: Choose which sound to play when the timer ends
